answerText: The Dangerous Summer[10] This novel is set during the Spanish Civil War. It chronicles American Robert Jordan's attempts to destroy a bridge despite the betrayal of guerillas such as Pablo.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Harvard A and Virginia B | 2 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, name these books by Ernest Hemingway. [10] This nonfiction book about bullfighting chronicles the rivalry during 1959 of the bullfighters Luis Miguel Dominguin and Antoni Ordonez. This was the last thing Hemingway wrote.
